page.title: 05HAXBY VILLAGE SURVEYS
page.content: On the 2nd of July about ten children and two adults went into the village of Haxby.We were there to gather information for the Domesday Project by asking questions of the people in the village. We asked some questions on whether or not people would like Haxby Railway Station to be reopened.Twenty -eight people said they would like it to be reopened. However only two people said they would use it every day, but seventeen said they would use it every week. I told my Dad the results of our survey because he works for British Rail. He said that it had nothing at all to do with British Rail, the Council have to decide what to do.
